metadata.name: Potential RDP Tunneling Via Plink
metadata.comment: Execution of plink to perform data exfiltration and tunneling

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\plink.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':127.0.0.1:3389')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\plink.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':3389')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p 443')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -p 22')))))

output.summary: Execution of plink to perform data exfiltration and tunneling
